node.title: How to Use Tracing the Footsteps of Jesus Evangelistically
node.description: “Tracing the Footsteps of Jesus” is enjoyed around the world on television. Did you know it was designed as an evangelistic tool with beautiful printed study guides? Imagine inviting your community to your church to explore the life of Jesus and have biblical teachings like the Sabbath and death come into focus! In this seminar you will discover proven advertising materials that will bring guests to your church and see how to use it evangelistically.
